name: SOUL (MiniJam72)
description:
Soul was created during MiniJam 72 - Adventure ! 

Soul was created in 72 Hours with the limitation that Death had to be a primary mechanic in the game, Soul uses this unique idea and has players solve puzzles and make their way through a dungeon, Utilizing their special ability to temporarily die and have their soul leave their body.

Created by

James Smith - Design & Ui Programming @Ohdamn_ItsJam
Henry Nicol - Programming, Level Design @HenryWNicol
Mike White - Programming, Level Design @MikeTheMadLad
Megan Norman - 2D Art @cozy

Created in Unreal Engine
